text: If a trustee disclaims an interest in property that otherwise would have become trust property, the interest does not become trust property.
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For Law 16-205, see notes following ยง 19-1501.

Uniform Law

This section is based upon ยง 8 of the Uniform Disclaimer of Property Interests Act (1999). See 8A, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
